page.title: 16A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: I am a pupil at Sherborne school. I come to school in my mum's car from Northleach with my friend Julie. We set out about ten minutes to nine. When I get to school sometimes I play, but usually the bell is ringing when I get there.When we go in we hang up our coats and bags and our headmaster does the register.We have assembly.After, we sometimes read.Then I do my handwriting.At playtime I have my milk. After the bell has rung we do some maths.After we have done that we have lunch.I have sandwiches for lunch. We all eat in the junior class. After lunch we have a playtime. We go in at one o'clock.If we haven't finished all of our work we finish it off.Sometimes we do running in the summer and we might have a game of football in the winter.We go home at a quarter past three.
